Package fr.ign.artiscales.pm.analysis

Class GetParametersOfScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ign.artiscales.pm.analysis.GetParametersOfScene
  • public class GetParametersOfScene
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates values for the description of an urban fabric. It is aimed to help the setting of ProfileUrbanFabric parameters. It can work on different scales, from the ilot or the GeneralFields.zonePreciseNameField to a whole community.
    Author:
    Maxime Colomb

                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Generate a graph with the area of parcels.
        Parameters:
        scaleZone - The scale of the studied zone. Can either be:
        • community
        • genericZone
        • preciseZone
        • islet

        java.io.IOException
